Shivah::

"When lava levels are up"said Shivah "Just exist a way to leave 
BlacFortress... We should leave some bots to keep this tramp" said 
aiming the place where Foxfingers and Razorclaws where"Around four or 
six will be good -or do you rather that acyd up the level again?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>        He stood a short distance behind the assembled commanders 
and laughed 
> to himself.  "I wonder if anyone is ever going to listen to me."  
He turns 
> around and wanders through the base waiting for an exit to open up.
